price: Marcadas junto de teu Senhor. E elas não estão longe dos injustos.
arabic: مُّسَوَّمَةً عِندَ رَبِّكَۖ وَمَا هِيَ مِنَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ بِبَعِيدٖ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: musawwamatan ʿinda rabbika wamā hiya mina al-ẓālimīna bibaʿīdin
